title: Branded
description: What do you do after watching your employee be raped by men who want information about your oldest friend?Nya Yorke isn't strong enough to take them down alone, but she can't let the men who raided her nightclub away with murder. It turns out that the man who rescues her from the same fate is capable of committing horrors, and Nya recognizes that he is the key to completing a mission of her own.Archer wants Tag, her oldest friend, and if she can broker a deal to get him what he wants then she might be able to punish the men who attacked her colleague.Nya needs an ally, but quickly learns that wearing Archer's mark means more than deferring to him, it could change the course of her Contains explicit language and imagery. Suitable only for ages 18 and over.
author: Scarlett Finn
